item.title: Hello, World
item.description: At the end of last year I decided to start writing a blog. The plan was simple, consisting of nothing more than putting up a blog engine and starting pet projects that I could write about. Those would be the essential ingredients needed to get into the habit of writing.

item.title: about
item.description: This site acts as a journal for ideas and projects relating to my work and other interests. I am a data science lead with experience across industries and problem spaces. Many projects involve working closely with product and company leadership at a strategic level to realise the potential of data & AI.
